timeline.message: Add equals, hashcode to VariablesSerializers so that the same works in GraphQLRequest

timeline.author: jpignata
jpignata

replies.bodyText:
Logically, yes.
But, I think it's better to keep as is because:

It matches the rest of the codebase
It's what the IDE generates if you ask it to add equals/hashcode.
replies.author: richardmcclellan
